summary:
This mod adds a new spell tome which is similar to \"Candlelight\" spell but with very large radius lighting (4096).
It\'s useful for who have mods that makes dark nights and/or dungeons.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to

MannyGT\'s Mods
[size=6]SUPREME CANDLELIGHT[/size][/center]

[color=olive]* OVERVIEW *[/color]
This mod adds a new spell tome which is similar to \"Candlelight\" spell but with very large radius (4096).
It\'s useful for who have mods that makes dark nights and/or dungeons.

[color=olive]* WHERE IS THE SPELL TOME? *[/color]
At Riverwood, near the inn

[color=olive]* INSTALL *[/color]
Place the ESP and activate it

[color=olive]* UNINSTALL *[/color]
Remove the ESP

[color=olive]* COMPATIBILITY *[/color]
Totally compatible with any mod because doese not replaces any spell.

[color=olive]* BUGS *[/color]
Please report to me if you find any bug. Thank you!

[color=cyan]* FACEBOOK *[/color]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods]https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods[/url]

Join me!
author: MannyGT
